mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_pay_list( id, ckAppId, ckChannelId, versionName, mmappid, payType, area, timeframe, isUse, create_date, create_by ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{ckAppId}, #{ckChannelId}, #{versionName}, #{mmappid}, #{payType}, #{area}, #{timeframe}, #{isUse}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, ckAppId, ckChannelId, versionName, mmappid, payType, area, timeframe, isUse, create_date as createDate, create_by as createBy FROM app_pay_list a WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT ckAppId, ckChannelId, versionName, mmappid, payType, area FROM app_pay_list a WHERE a.ckAppId = #{ckAppId} and a.ckChannelId = #{ckChannelId} and a.isUse = 1 ORDER BY a.create_date desc LIMIT 1
